entry.title: Homework for the Week of 5/25/15

div.font: Monday is MEMORIAL DAY - Remember those who made the ultimate sacrifice

Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and the weekend: Study for your semester exam. The study sheet for the Genre Literature semester exam is attached to this post. Download it, read it, and be prepared with questions for review during the week. Monday Class One's exam is on Wednesday, June 3 during the second exam block. Monday Class Six's exam is on Monday, June 1 during the first exam block.
